examples.korean: She is clearly suffering from delusions of grandeur. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 분명히 과대망상이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: They overestimated his ability when they promoted him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 그를 승진시키면서 그의 능력을 과대평가했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
